text: Though #COVID19 does not spread as readily outdoors, there is a real risk of transmission during the #BlackLivesMatter protests. If you are protesting, wear a mask to protect others, and please consider getting tested a few days later to mitigate risk to family and community.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

entity.name: COVID-19 misinformation
entity.description: This is a list of Tweets highlighting corrections to misinformation surrounding COVID-19 from experts, fact-checkers and journalists.
